issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: appcd-core
components.description: Core daemon logic: config, plugin loader, logging, dispatcher

fields.description:
The appc daemon needs to provide a evented hook system for plugins to use services to use and expose functionality to other services.

The hook system is based on the concepts of the hook system in the Titanium CLI. The main differences are the new hooks system will be based on ES6 promises.

The event names should follow the convention of "module:foo.bar".
fields.summary: appcd: Integrate hook system into appc daemon
